title: Official Placements Stats of 2024 shown in Orientation of 2025 batch Placements

comments.body:
Anyone knows what pes considers as tier 1,tier 2, tier 3

In the placement stats made by students 
T1-387
T2-352
T3-59
orientation was held for which year students? 3rd year or 4th year?
T1 is 12-15 lpa and more T3 is 3-4 lpa and T2 is in between
Niqqa it says 2025 batch, and I don’t think so pes offers any 1 year engineering degree. So it’s the ones who are going to 4th year now
wait wtf, mechanical kids have gotten more core jobs then ECE ( percentage wise) .
Lol yea!! That was last mech batch
What's the split in CSE placements stat between Ring road campus and Electronic city campus
